events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th, involving rear-end collision at a traffic light.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords related to vehicle collision.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to handle the case, responsible for communication and follow-up with the claimant.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and detailing the next steps in the process.
Customer was requested to submit an accident report, police report, photos of the damaged car, and repair estimates.
The claimant provided all requested documents including police report, accident photos, and mechanic’s damage assessment.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and background information related to the vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded there was clear fault on the other driver’s side and claimant's vehicle damage was documented properly.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental reimbursement was sent to the claimant for review and approval.
The claimant responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the clear communication.
Claim was officially approved, authorizing payment to the repair shop and rental car provider as per the settlement terms.
Payment for the vehicle repairs and rental car costs was issued promptly to the respective parties.
The claim was closed after confirmation that all payments were received and the customer’s vehicle was fully repaired.
